Address.value: 209 REDWOOD SHORES PARKWAY, REDWOOD CITY, California, 94065, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: EA is one of the world's largest third-party video game publishers and has transitioned from a console-based video game publisher to the one of the largest publishers on consoles, PC, and mobile. The firm owns number of large franchises, including Madden, FIFA, Battlefield, Apex Legends, Mass Effect, Dragon's Age, and Need for Speed.
